txt.en:
'Have you dealt with the outposts?'

You tell Galâmka that you have successfully defeated the Orcs in the outposts the scouts had found.

'Wonderous news! Again, I can not thank you enough for all that you have done. Our preparations here are coming to an end and hope grows in the people. I ask that you join us in battle. We are ready to retake our home.

'We are ready to fight for Maurûsh.'

'Good, you have arrived. The battle draws near but there is one more task I ask of you.

'My scouts have returned from the spots detailed in the scraps you recovered from the Orcs. They mark the locations of Orc outposts and from what my scouts can gather they are for scouting and calling for help if Maurûsh should come under heavy attack. We must take them out before we can attempt to take the stronghold.'

Galâmka gestures to three locations on his map surrounding Maurûsh.

'These spots to the west, south, and east are where the outposts stand. Go there are slay the Orcs so they can not call for aid during our attack.'
Return to Galâmka in Ub Nishir
Defeat the Orcs at the western outpost to help Galâmka in their preparations for the battle in Maurûsh.
Galâmka has asked you to clear out the outposts the Orcs have set up outside of Maurûsh to prevent them from calling for help when the attack begins.
Find the Orc outpost to the west of Maurûsh that was discovered by the scouts.
Find the Orc outpost to the south of Maurûsh that was discovered by the scouts.
Find the Orc outpost to the east of Maurûsh that was discovered by the scouts.
Defeat the Orcs at the southern outpost to help Galâmka in their preparations for the battle in Maurûsh.
Defeat the Orcs at the eastern outpost to help Galâmka in their preparations for the battle in Maurûsh.
Return to Galâmka in Ub Nishir to the north of Maurûsh and inform him that the outposts have been cleared out.
Good, you have arrived. The battle draws near but there is one more task I ask of you.
